body_html:
If bazel do not go with TF - no
I barely managed to build single bazel. That was another challenge to make it on OpenPower :)

$ which bazel
/trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/bazel/0.4.4/bin/bazel
$ type -f bazel
bazel is /trinity/shared/apps/cv-ppc64le/bazel/0.4.4/bin/bazel
